mapper.insert: insert into dict (dict_id, dict_name, dict_type, parentid) values (#{dict_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dict_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dict_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dict
dict_id,
dict_name,
dict_type,
parentid,
dict_index,
#{dict_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dict_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dict_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update dict
dict_name = #{dict_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_type = #{dict_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_index = #{dict_index,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dict_id = #{dict_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from dict where 1=1
and dict_type = #{dict_type}
order by dict_type,dict_index

select
from dict where 1=1
and parentid = #{parentid}
order by dict_type,dict_index
